summary.text:
Strives to be visually consistent and comparable to the GitHub MarkDown rendering in look and feel.

In order to facilitate compatibility with [github-markdown-css](https://github.com/sindresorhus/github-markdown-css),
the default TypeDoc highlighting module,

text.comment:
typedoc-theme-yaf Strives to be visually consistent and comparable to the GitHub MarkDown rendering in look and feel.

In order to facilitate compatibility with github-markdown-css, the default TypeDoc highlighting module, Shiki, is replaced with starry-night.
